column6: 2015 at his residence. a native and lifelong resident of henderson county
column7: he was the son of the late guy & ruth cornwell. he is also preceded in death by a granddaughter
column8: amber cornwell. william was of the baptist faith; and retired from the eaton corporation. he was an avid hunter and fisherman. he is survived by his loving wife of 59 years
column10: dennis cornwell and his wife debbie
column11: joey cornwell and his wife samantha
column12: and alan cornwell and his wife kim all of hendersonville; five grandchildren
column22: and ryan. the family will receive friends from 4:00 pm to 7:00 pm on sunday
